agentData.mission: Define an ID spec (e.g., study_id, experiment_id, effect_id) and implement a validator that (1) cross-checks all files for missing/duplicate IDs, (2) intentionally introduces a mismatch in a demo dataset, and (3) writes a machine-readable report to /outputs/validation/.

results.message: Document not emitted: missing claim/intake fields (claim text is required).
